marketing-text: Sethala sa mohloli se bulehileng sa data ea COVID19. Dashboard e tsoetseng pele e nang le katoloso ea sebatli le "REST API" e ntlafalitsoeng, e fumanehang lipuong tsohle.
highest-death-rate: Palo e phahameng ka ho fetisisa ea lefu
lowest-death-rate: Palo e tlase haholo ea lefu
highest-recovery-rate: Sekhahla se phahameng sa ho hlaphoheloa
lowest-recovery-rate: Sekhahla se tlase sa ho hlaphoheloa
name: Lebitso
promo-message: E entsoe ka lerato ❤️ ke sehlopha ho Hoobu.com. Rala leeto la hau la koluoa ea morao-rao hona joale ka moralo oa rona oa nako ea tšebelisano ea nako ea nnete e ntle
general-advice-wash-hands-description: Hlatsoa matsoho khafetsa, 'me u qetetse ho sebelisa sesepa le metsi metsotsoana e 20 ha u qeta ho hlaba nko, khohlela kapa ho thimola. Ho hlatsoa matsoho ka nepo ke tsela e atlehang ka ho fetisisa ea ho bolaea likokoana-hloko.
general-advice-minimise-contact-descript: Fokotsa likopano le maeto ao e seng a bohlokoa 'me u batle mekhoa e meng ea litumeliso tse kang ho tsukutlana ka matsoho, ho hakana kapa ho aka.
general-advice-avoid-face-title: Se ke oa ama sefahleho sa hau
general-advice-avoid-face-description: Matsoho a ka nka livaerase habonolo mme hang ha a tšoaetsoe, matsoho a ka fetisetsa vaerase mahlong, nko kapa molomo. Ho tloha moo, vaerase e ka kena 'meleng oa hau ea u kulisa.
general-advice-be-hygienic-description: Ho koahela molomo le nko ka setsoe sa hao se boreleli kapa thaole ha u khohlela kapa u thimola, 'me u lahla lintho tse sebelisitsoeng kapele.
general-advice-self-isolate-description: Haeba u tšoaroa ke ntaramane joaloka matšoao u lokela ho itšehla thajana e le mokhoa oa ho itšireletsa 'me u qobe kotsi ea ho jala tšoaetso ka ho lula hae.
